Instruction: Press tofu to remove excess water and crumble into small pieces.
Combine hoisin sauce, soy sauce, rice vinegar, sesame oil, and minced garlic in a small bowl.
Heat a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat.
Add tofu to the skillet and cook until golden brown and crispy.
Pour the hoisin sauce mixture over the tofu and stir to coat.
Serve tofu mixture in lettuce leaves with sliced green onions.
